resources.string: Welcome to Memory For Blind Game! Swipe up to start new game, swipe left to set board size, swipe right to listen to help, and swipe down if you wish to exit game

Instructions for the game: the game is to find all pairs of cards face down on the screen. To control the game uses the offset gestures to move around the board, and double-tap to reveal card. To exit the game, shake the device. Good luck!
Tap the screen as many times as you want to have pairs in the game (not more than 18). Long tap to confirm.
Tile is uncovered and its value is %s
